message.content:
cs.CR, cs.OS, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.NI 

The paper discusses attacks on host computers by malicious peripherals, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a solution that involves virtualization technology and an interposition layer, which are topics related to operating systems (cs.OS) and system software (cs.SY). The paper also mentions the use of network security tools such as firewalls and VPNs, which are topics related to software engineering (cs.SE) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
